headline: Assurant Board of Directors Declares Quarterly Dividend of $0.80 per Common Share
summary: ATLANTA, May 21, 2025--Assurant, Inc. (NYSE: AIZ), a premier global protection company that safeguards and services connected devices, homes and automobiles in partnership with the world’s leading brands, today announced that its Board of Directors declared a quarterly dividend of $0.80 per share of common stock. The dividend will be payable on June 30, 2025 to stockholders of record as of the close of business on June 9, 2025.
